name: Dino Safari (Lina)
description:
Dino Safari was made for the 10 day Dino Jam 2 in November 2022.

Dinosaurs are still alive! But not for long...An active volcano is about to blow up the last living dinosaurs of this mystical island. Document them in photographs before it is too late!

A game by Lina Lundstedt

with Original soundtrack by Samantha Vandersluis

Additional sounds by:

BBC sound library vol 3

freeanimalsounds.org

Dedicado a Augusto!
